posts.title: Title 1
posts.description: Alright. So it’s safe to say that I’m bored AF of watching Udemy “lectures”. Not that the course i'm watching is bad, it's actually very good. The thing is, I just want to start diving into making my own projects.  I consumed hours of course materials yesterday, and I learned quite a bit. But I know that the best way for me to learn is to just get my hands dirty. So Today

posts.title: Day 3 - Maybe I have a slight idea
posts.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud

This was my first day learning React (kinda)....  I started learning by following a React course I bought on Udemy. this one here: React - The Complete Guide.  I bought this course when it was on sale (shocker right?). I’ve been speed running through as much content as possible on 1.5 speed. I’ve made it through a bunch of modules. I’ve learned about:
